message.content:
{"id": "19089", "title": "No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)", "description": "When trying to access the popup menu in the left vertical ruler of the Java editor in Photon version, it does not appear.", "OB": "1) Open the Java editor.2) Right click on the left vertical ruler.

The menu to add breakpoints, marks, etc. should be displayed.", "EB": "1) Open the Java editor.2) Right click on the left vertical ruler.

The menu to add breakpoints, marks, etc. does not appear.", "SR": "1) Open the Java editor.2) Right click on the left vertical ruler.

Verify that the menu to add breakpoints, marks, etc. does not appear."}
